action.content:
You are playing a text adventure game. I will describe what you can perceive in the game. You write the single action you want to take in the game starting with >. Only reply with an action.
For example:
> open cupboard

You can have up to two objects in your inventory at the same time.

Your goal for this game is to brew a potion following the potion recipe.

Once you have achieved your goal, write "> done" to end the game.

You are in a bedroom now. There are a pillow, a bed, a potion recipe, a book and a wardrobe. The pillow is on the floor. The potion recipe is on the bed. The book is on the bed. The wardrobe is closed. There is a passage to a reading room here.
action.label: context

action.content: You take the potion recipe. In your inventory you have a potion recipe.
action.label: context

action.content: You are in a reading room now. There are a couch, a chair, a side table, a table and a shelf. There are passages to a garden and a conservatory here.
action.label: context

action.content: You are in a garden now. There are a nightshade, a garden bench, a bucket of water and a lily of the valley. The nightshade is on the floor. The bucket of water is on the floor. The lily of the valley is on the floor. There are passages to a outhouse and a storage room here.
action.label: context

action.content: You take the nightshade. In your inventory you have a nightshade and a potion recipe.
action.label: context

action.content: You are in a storage room now. There are a plonkle crystal, a ladle, a borpulus, a spoon, a plunkle crystal, a crate, a plinkle crystal and a whisk. The plonkle crystal is on the floor. The ladle is on the floor. The borpulus is on the floor. The spoon is on the floor. The plunkle crystal is on the floor. The plinkle crystal is on the floor. The whisk is on the floor. There are passages to a cellar and a hallway here.
action.label: context

action.content: Your inventory can not hold more than two objects at the same time.
action.label: context

action.content: You drop the nightshade on the floor.
action.label: context

action.content: You take the borpulus. In your inventory you have a potion recipe and a borpulus.
action.label: context

action.content: You are in a cellar now. There are a green beetle, a spider egg, a spider, a bucket of ectoplasm, a red beetle and a spiderweb. The green beetle is on the floor. The spider egg is on the floor. The spider is on the floor. The bucket of ectoplasm is on the floor. The red beetle is on the floor. The spiderweb is on the floor. There is a passage to a hallway here.
action.label: context

action.content: Your inventory can not hold more than two objects at the same time.
action.label: context

action.content: You drop the borpulus on the floor.
action.label: context

action.content: You take the bucket of ectoplasm. In your inventory you have a potion recipe and a bucket of ectoplasm.
action.label: context

action.content: You are in a hallway now. There are passages to a magic workshop, a broom closet, a bedroom and a reading room here.
action.label: context

action.content:
You are in a magic workshop now. There are a ice wand, a fire wand, a workbench, a fairy wand, a zulpowand and a orrery. The ice wand is on the ceiling. The fire wand is on the ceiling. The fairy wand is on the ceiling. The zulpowand is on the ceiling. There are passages to a bedroom and a kitchen here.
Magical experiments have reversed and dampened gravity in this room. You begin to float in the air.
action.label: context

action.content:
You are in a kitchen now. There are a plate, a cupboard, a cauldron and a counter. The plate is on the floor. The cupboard is closed. The cauldron is on the floor. There are passages to a conservatory and a pantry here.
Gravity behaves normally in this room. You stop floating in the air.
action.label: context

action.label: context

action.content: You drop the bucket of ectoplasm on the floor.
action.label: context
